name: Lords of Chaos: Expansion Kit One
description:
This add-on for Lords of Chaos was available from its developer via mail order. It features two new scenarios:

  • Scenario Four: The Islands of Iris, in which the player will explore the Forest of Eyes
  • Scenario Five: Tombs of the Undead, in which the player will search for the Staff of Wrath, hidden in the tomb of Shazard the Indestructible (one player only, for level 5 wizard)
alsoFor: Amiga, Amstrad CPC, Atari ST, Commodore 64 | Combined View
